content: The “Martin Luther King of health care”? Seriously? I wonder if Lord believes that King fought for civil rights for African Americans by proposing legislation that would essentially screw them over, and when failing to get that, threatened to find another way to screw them over until such legislation could be passed? Lord needs to go back to the drawing board and find another analogy. The one he has would be hilarious if we weren’t talking about people’s lives here.
